snippet.title: Purgatory Dungeoneer - ANNOUNCEMENT TRAILER
snippet.description:
Purgatory Dungeoneer (AKA My Grandpa Died And All He Left Me Was This 1 Dungeon In Purgatory Filled With Nihilistic Adventurers) is a townbuilding roguelite RPG about plundering a psychic hellmaw for personal closure, and the resources to build a village beyond the grave. Coming soon to itch.io and Steam.

STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1963010
DEVELOPER ITCH: https://cannibalinteractive.itch.io/
DEVELOPER TWITTER: https://twitter.com/TheWorstRPGDev
PUBLISHER TWITTER: https://twitter.com/WritNelson
